subject: Load Update – PRO# 578923 – On-Time Delivery
body:
Hi Team,


Just wanted to send a quick update on the following load:


  *   Carrier: ABC Freight
  *   PRO#: 578923
  *   Pickup: Dallas, TX – 04/16/2025 @ 10:00 AM
  *   Delivery: Atlanta, GA – 04/18/2025 @ 2:00 PM
  *   Driver Name: Jose Martinez
  *   Truck #: TX-8890
  *   Current Location: Jackson, MS
  *   ETA to Delivery: Still on track for 2:00 PM tomorrow.



Please let me know if you need anything else.


Thanks,

Sarah M.

ABC Freight Dispatch

dispatch@abcfreight.com

(512) 555-0192
